thread.title: Jose Mourinho: Man United boss’ constant sniping at Chelsea and Antonio Conte is killing his relationship with the Blues supporters

author: achapman
title: Jose Mourinho: Man United boss’ constant sniping at Chelsea and Antonio Conte is killing his relationship with the Blues supporters
text:
EFL NO MOUR Jose Mourinho: Man United boss’ constant sniping at Chelsea and Antonio Conte is killing his relationship with the Blues supporters 
Red Devils boss is making a habit of talking about former side's 'defensive' football and needs to focus on his new club Fan's view By David Johnstone, CFC UK Fanzine 14th March 2017, 10:30 pm Updated: 14th March 2017, 11:11 pm
